title: Initialize new app baseline with themed landing page

requirements.text: Provide a clean initial landing page that confirms the project is set up and ready for feature development, including: app name/title, short tagline, and a simple primary call-to-action button (no specific feature behavior required yet).
acceptanceCriteria: App loads successfully and displays a single coherent landing screen without errors.
All user-facing text on the landing page is in English.
Landing page includes: title, tagline/description, and one primary button with placeholder behavior (e.g., no-op or disabled) that does not break the app.

requirements.text: Create and apply a cohesive visual theme for the UI (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across the landing page. Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page uses a consistent color palette, typographic scale, and spacing system.
Theme avoids blue/purple as the primary palette.
UI styling is implemented with Tailwind and existing UI components composed without modifying immutable UI component source files.

requirements.text: Add the generated static images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them on the landing page (e.g., hero background and app mark).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Landing page displays both images without routing them through the backend.
Images render correctly in production build (static asset paths resolve).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not modify files in frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing any domain-specific features (e.g., tasks, payments, chat) before the user specifies requirements.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed, but not required for this baseline).
Adding external databases or non-supported backend technologies.

required: Abstract geometric hero background with warm neutrals and subtle grain (hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
Minimal app mark/logo: simple monogram inside a rounded shape, neutral palette (app-mark.dim_512x512.png)
